text_block_list.text: In the end, I was unable to clear up the misunderstanding that Taiki Shuttle had, and the next day had arrived.
Going with the flow in to a contract is probably a bad idea, so I went to look for her to explain-
…In the central square, I found a group of lively Uma Musume, with Taiki Shuttle in the center.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Gulp…!! Fukukitaru, okay, I'm ready! Tell me your [Divination], please…!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Okay! Here we go~…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Even in anger, and in love, a star shines through… "Shiraoki-sama", bestow upon us your oracle…!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: …hah…! I can see iiiiiiiit!!! In short, Taiki-san! This month, your lucky direction is… East South-East!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh yes!! I got it, Fukukitaru!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Which means, Suzuka!! The party's gonna be held in the East South-South… East-East? That's where it's gonna be!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, East South-East, right? East South-South East-East… what direction would that end up being…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Well well, don't sweat the small stuff!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That aside Suzuka, I hope you're looking forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: It's a barbeque party so, we're gonna eat and eat until we're stuffed!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I-I'm glad you're inviting me but, eating until I'm stuffed is a little troubling…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: But I'm glad for you, Taiki-san!! Congratulations on your trainer contract!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Fukukitaru!! You definitely should come too!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I want to invite even more of my friends too~. Happy things become even happier when everyone is there!!
Taiki Shuttle was surrounded by everyone, and was having a fun conversation… It seemed like she was a bright, amicable girl with lots of friends.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: -Trainer-san!! Howdy~~~!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I saw that you were here so I came over! I'm looking forward to today's training!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'm, well~, told pretty often that my concentration skills are kinda bad but… Don't worry!! I'll do my best!
…when she's showing this much motiviation, I'd feel really bad if I just flat out turned her down.
The first thing I should do, is harden my heart and-
choice_data_list: Looking forward to working with you, Taiki Shuttle!
Looking forward to working with you, Taiki Shuttle!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yeah!! Looking forward to working with you!!
And so, Taiki Shuttle's first training session came, but-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: -Ah! Suzukaaaa~~!! Howdy~~!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, Taiki… Stop! Please don't jump at me.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh!!…how sad. Hugs are a sign of affection though!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Well yours are just a bit too… spirited… anyways, aren't you in the middle of training?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's right!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, I'm sorry for suddenly dashing off like that! I spotted Suzuka, so I couldn't help myself.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, I know!! Since we've come this far, how about training together with Suzuka?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh? Um… I-is that fine, Trainer-san…?
…I didn't have any plans, but having someone as strong as Silence Suzuka do some parallel-running training, was honestly greatly appreciated.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Understood. Today I was planning on doing some long distance running so, do you mind if we head outside the school grounds?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Outside?! Sounds like fun!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Absolutely no problem! Let's go, let's go!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Wait wait, Taiki, just now I was asking Trainer-san, you know…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Off we goooooo!! Yahoooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah?! Wai-…W-We'll be off then!!
While wondering if everything was going to be fine, I waited by the front gate for them to return. And then-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa… we've returned.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh?…H-huh?! I'm pretty sure she was just running right behind me…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: S-sorry…! She has a tendency to run off and talk to anyone, and I thought I was being careful about that but…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: When I'm running I tend to get so focused… I-I'm really sorry!!
Together with Silence Suzuka, we looked around the running course they had taken to try to find Taiki Shuttle…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: BANG!! …Yes! Another bull's eye!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, Taiki's voice…! Let's go take a look!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text: Let me try, let me try, I wanna do it next! Onee-chan, show me how!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Leave it to me, the gunman that never misses!! Even with a toy pistol like this, I could become the hero of a Western~!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Taiki! Thank goodness, we found you here…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, Suzuka and Trainer-san! Why are you both so flustered, is something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wait, Oooooooooh!! Sorry!! I was in the middle of a run…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Taiki…
…The days with Taiki Shuttle, looked like they were going to be long.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Well, I made some cute friends, or something like that… P-please forgive me…!
